attributes.action: Stamp Out Anti Social Behaviour Using the Following 20 point plan:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Opt out of Human Rights Act.
2. Give back discretion to Police.
3. Allow police to use common sense.
4. Bring back corporal punishment in schools. Give power back to teachers.
5. Bring back National Service.
6. More diversionary options for youths. (Investment in outreach youth work).
7. Mandatory life prison for drug dealers. (No exceptions).
8. Minimum £2,500 fine or 1 yrs prison for those supplying alcohol to youths.
9. Mandatory loss of license for off licensees/landlords selling alcohol to youths. 
10. Cap on amount of licensed premises in a given radius.
11. Incentive to youths who stay out of trouble. (Cash at 18 and another amount at 21).
12. Mandatory maximum sentences for violent crimes.
13. Monitored CCTV in urban areas and in areas of high reported Anti Social Behaviour.
14. Setting up of a new police/multi agency unit to work shifts, 7 days to tackle anti social behaviour.
15. Automatic refusal of bail for violent crimes.
16. Education of youths/parents re Anti Social Behaviour.
17. More responsibility on parents re the behaviour of their children.
18. Improved drug treatment programmes.
19. Higher classification of cannabis.
20. More rigorous laws re truancy.
